message: Room77, followed by Lockify.  Also liking Stomp.  The others may be great, but I have less resonance with them.  FTW has some rough edges, but I think the basic idea of a cross-platform, cross game save engine is sound.
FTW is pretty cool. Room 77 would be my second choice.
the judges travel a lot so they're probably biased :D
I got a shitty view at my hotel here ;-)

Room 77 hands down! I want to see something like this/seat geek for concerts and sporting events. I went to a Wilco concert last year and purchased what I thought were great tickets... #1 and #2. There was a big pillar 3 feet in front of me and my body was half lit up by the aisle lighting/half dark. I want real pictures of each seat!
I'm going home and going to explore squirrell fishing with my son!  I really got something out of this first group!
I like the problem Lockify is trying to solve. Just needs to be /much/ simpler.
